climatePledgeFriendly.details: Climate neutral by ClimatePartner certifies the carbon footprint of a product was calculated and all associated emissions were offset.

features: MADE WITH LOVE AND RECYCLED OCEAN PLASTIC not only providing a high-quality, long-lasting shaving handle but also helping to stem the flow of plastic reaching the ocean.
INCLUDE ONE RAZOR HANDLE AND ONE FIVE-BLADE RAZOR CARTRIDGE 5 blade cartridge features ceramic coated blades for improved comfort and a lubricating strip with cocoa butter and aloe
FOR USE BY BOTH WOMEN AND MEN AND SHAVERS OF ALL STRIPES
BLADES ARE MADE IN THE USA cartridges are assembled in Mexico. Never tested on animals.
25% OF THE PROCEEDS OF POPi PRODUCTS ARE DONATED to non-profits that work to clean up oceans and beaches, support marine conservation and research plastic pollution.

B CORP CERTIFIED AND CLIMATE NEUTRAL CERTIFIED. Preserve has been a Certified B Corp since 2009 and recently became Climate Neutral Certified which means we have offset all of our company emissions from making and delivering our products in the past year and we are working to reduce future emissions.
body.description: Preserve Story and Mission Preserve, a certified B Corporation, is a sustainable consumer goods company that produces stylish household products, as well as products for food service. Preserve's business model is centered on mitigating the environmental impact of consumer products by producing products that require lower carbon emissions, lead to less consumption and waste, and protect the oceans. Using proprietary sourcing, recycling, and manufacturing systems, Preserve has developed the ability to make well designed, sustainable consumer products out of recycled materials, plant-based bioplastics and ocean diverted plastics.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What is the Preserve Ocean Plastic Initiative (POPi)? Preserve Ocean Plastic Initiative (POPi) makes great products from plastic that was rescued from coastlines and waterways and was at risk of entering the ocean. We know that one razor or one toothbrush doesn’t solve the enormous problem of ocean plastic but prevention is key and little steps count. We are proud to be taking steps to support some amazing organizations that are having a positive impact on ocean health. 25% of proceeds from POPi products are donated to non-profits on the forefront of solving the ocean plastic crisis.

POPi Shave 5 Shave 5 Shave 3 Number of blades on each cartridge 5 blades on each cartridge 5 blades on each cartridge 3 blades on each cartridge Handle material Recycled #2 ocean plastic Recycled #5 plastic Recycled #5 plastic Compatible with Preserve Shave 5 and POPi Shave 5 replacement blades ✓ ✓ Compatible with Preserve Shave 3 replacement blades ✓ Handle recyclable through Preserve’s mail-in recycling program ✓ ✓ ✓ Razor type Premium shave line Premium shave line Value-priced shave line

Preserve Story and Mission Preserve, a certified B Corporation, is a sustainable consumer goods company that produces stylish household products, as well as products for food service. Preserve's business model is centered on mitigating the environmental impact of consumer products by producing products that require lower carbon emissions, lead to less consumption and waste, and protect the oceans. Using proprietary sourcing, recycling, and manufacturing systems, Preserve has developed the ability to make well designed, sustainable consumer products out of recycled materials, plant-based bioplastics and ocean diverted plastics. Certifications & Recycling Program B Corp Certified 2021 by B Lab Climate Neutral Certified 2021 by Climate Neutral POPi Shave 5 handle and POPi toothbrush are recyclable through Preserve's mail-in recycling program

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Happy hairy parts
reviews.reviewText: I’m very eco consious . In the spirit of minimizing disposable consumerism, I’ve been using the old school razor (not electric) for a couple of years. Eek gads, my legs suffered so many nicks!!!! I finally got tired of sheering skin off. I bought this razor as a compromise because it’s plastic, but recycled and recyclable. I’ve been happy and relieved to be able to shave without damage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to use

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this razor.
reviews.reviewText: This is the most comfortable razor I have ever used. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This razor is alright, not great nor bad. Although, I miss the smooth glide of my Schick razor, I can suffice that for a more environmentally friendly razor that still gets the job done.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great shave, Good moisture strip
reviews.reviewText: I don’t like moisture strips in razors as a rule because they irritate my sensitive skin and are usually gummy and hard to rinse off. But this one is all natural and feels like it’s actually good for my skin! The razor gives a great close smooth shave and the very low environmental impact is a win for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars From Packaging to Product Design it has it ALL
reviews.reviewText: When I first opened up my package, I was confused. What was did little paper brown baggie at the bottom of my bag? *looks around* The paper housing is super thin, barely there but does an excellent job at housing the product. Environmentally friendly down to the packaging. The blades are constructed in Mexico from what I read on the paper bag. And let me tell you these blades are SO smooth and SO perfectly aligned that you will question if you are shaving anything or not. I have extremely thick hair and every time I shave its like sandpaper, I have to go over the area a few times in EVERY direction because apparently I grow FUR and my hair follicles grow in 3s, its a mess to say the least. But I was pleasantly surprised... albeit also extremely cautious at what a close and smooth shave this is. Be very careful as this razor is NO joke but will be your new best friend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Packaging doesn’t leave much confidence
reviews.reviewText: The razor has particles in it. Can’t tell if it’s been used or if it’s from the packaging. Now I have to wait for the refills because I do not trust the razor it came with. If the razors come in a similar way, I will not use them and will not order this product again. Nor will I recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I did get razor burn after first use but then didn’t after that. From what I see, the strip on the razor isn’t loaded with chemicals but still waiting to confirm that.
